data.title: Ken Olin
data.text:
Born: 30-Jul-1954

Birthplace: Chicago, IL

Gender: Male

Race or Ethnicity: White

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Actor

Party Affiliation: Democratic

Nationality: United States

Executive summary: Michael Steadman on thirtysomething

Wife: Patricia Wettig (m. 8-Nov-1982, one son, one daughter)

Son: Clifford

Daughter: Roxanne

University: University of Pennsylvania

Bill Bradley for President

Hillary Clinton for President

John Kerry for President

Obama for America

Thirtysomething Michael Steadman (1987-91)
